title: Macron: Sanktioner mod Rusland kan først løftes som del af fredsaftale
description: Både Frankrigs præsident, Emmanuel Macron, og Ukraines præsident, Volodymyr Zelenskyj, afviser Ruslands krav om at få ophævet sanktioner mod at Rusland indgår en delvis våbenhvile, der omfatter Sortehavet.Det siger de to præsidenter på et fælles pressemøde i Paris torsdag.Ifølge Manuel Macron er USA's præsident Donald Trumps udgangspunkt også "fred igennem styrke". Derfor vil USA heller ikke ophæve sanktionerne, siger Macron.- Fred igennem styrker betyder ikke, at man løfter sanktionerne uden at få noget igen, siger Macron.Han fremhæver, at Ukraine allerede har sagt ja til en fuld våbenhvile, selv om det er Ukraine, der er blevet angrebet.Omvendt vil Rusland indtil videre kun være med til afgrænsede våbenhviler. Den første blev indgået for at forhindre flere angreb på energiinfrastruktur.Trods forhandlinger med USA og Ukraine, fortsætter Rusland dog med at angribe Ukraine. Det gælder også civile mål, siger Emmanuel Macron.Derfor kan Rusland ikke forventet at få løftet sanktionerne, før man indgår en egentligt og fuldstændig fredsaftale, siger Macron.- At løfte sanktioner vil komme som del af robust og varig fred. Hvis Rusland respekterer international lov, så vil sanktionerne omgående blive løftet, siger Emmanuel Macron.Også Ukraines præsident, Volodymyr Zelenskyj, afviser, at sanktionerne kan løftes som del af en delvis våbenhvile i Sortehavet.- Vi har talt med USA, vi har talt med vores partnere i asien og med EU. Vi mener, at det er for tidligt at løfte sanktioner.- Vi vil tværtimod arbejde på nye sanktioner, så længe Rusland ikke går med til at afslutte krigen, siger Zelenskyj./ritzau/
title_translated: Macron: Sanctions against Russia can first be lifted as part of peace agreement
description_translated: Both France's President Emmanuel Macron, and Ukraine's President Volodymy Zelenskyj, rejects Russia's demand to abolish sanctions against Russia entering into a partial ceasefire that includes the Black Sea. It says the two presidents at a joint press conference in Paris on Thursday. Therefore, the United States will also not terminate the sanctions, says Macron. "Peace through forces does not mean that the sanctions are lifted without getting anything again, says Macron. He emphasizes that Ukraine has already agreed to a full ceasefire, even though Ukraine has been attacked. The first was concluded to prevent several attacks on energy infrastructure. However, Trod's negotiations with the United States and Ukraine, however, Russia continues to attack Ukraine. The same goes for civilian goals, says Emmanuel Macron. Therefore, Russia cannot expect to have the sanctions lifted before entering into an actual and complete peace agreement, says Macron.- To lift sanctions will come as part of robust and lasting peace. If Russia respects international law, then the sanctions will be lifted immediately, says Emmanuel Macron. Also Ukraine's President Volodymy Zelensky, rejects the sanctions can be lifted as part of a partial ceasefire in the Black Sea.- We have spoken to the United States, we have spoken to our partners in Asia and with the EU. We believe it is too early to lift sanctions.- On the contrary, we will work on new sanctions as long as Russia does not agree to end the war, says Zelenskyj./ritzau/

title: Filippinsk teenager slår sensationelt Swiatek
description: Den 19-årige filippiner Alexandra Eala har gang i et af de største turneringseventyr i kvindetennis i årevis.Onsdag aften dansk tid tog wildcard-spilleren en ny chokerende sejr og spillede sig i semifinalen af WTA 1000-turneringen Miami Open.I to sæt nedlagde hun verdensranglistens nummer to, polakken Iga Swiatek, med cifrene 6-2, 7-5. Det tog 100 minutter for den undertippede filippiner at gøre det af med verdensstjernen.Med sejren bliver Alexandra Eala den første filippiner til at nå en semifinale på WTA Touren.- Det er surrealistisk, siger den overvældede teenager efter sejren og fortæller kort om sin succesopskrift:- Jeg tror på mine slag, og så har jeg et godt team bag mig.Det er tredje gang i karrieren og første gang i fire år, at Swiatek taber til en spiller, der ligger uden for verdensranglistens top-100 ved en WTA-turnering.Alexandra Eala ligger nemlig nummer 140, men ser ind i at blive katapulteret mindst 65 pladser frem, når ranglisten opdateres på mandag.Tidligere i turneringen har hun overraskende sendt de tidligere grand slam-vindere Jelena Ostapenko og Madison Keys ud, mens Paula Badosa trak sig med en skade.Nu har Eala så taget karrierens foreløbig største skalp ved at slå en femdobbelt grand slam-vinder.I semifinalen venter enten briten Emma Raducanu eller verdensranglistens nummer fire, amerikaneren Jessica Pegula.Eala, der i 2022 vandt US Open i single for juniorer, har trænet på Rafael Nadals akademi på den spanske ø Mallorca, siden hun var 13 år.Familien tog dengang den svære beslutning at sende datteren til Spanien for at udvikle sig. Broren Miko blev også optaget på akademiet./ritzau/
title_translated: Filipino teenager beats sensationally Swatek
description_translated: 19-year-old Filipiner Alexandra Eala is embarking on one of the biggest tournament adventures in women's tennis for years. Women 7-5. It took 100 minutes for the tipped Filipiner to do away with the world star. With the victory, Alexandra Eala becomes the first Filipiner to reach a semi-final on the WTA Tour.- It is surreal, says the overwhelmed teenager after the victory and tells briefly about his success recipe:- I believe in my beats, and then I have a good team behind me. Swatek loses to a player who is outside the world ranking's top-100 at a WTA tournament. Alexandra Eala is number 140, but looks into being catapulted at least 65 seats forward when the ranking is updated on Monday. In the past in the tournament, she has surprisingly sent the former grand slam winners Jelena Ostapenko and Madison Key's withdrew with an injury.nu Eala has taken the career's tenth-largest scalp by beating a five-time grand slam winner. In the semi-finals, either British Emma Raducanu or the world ranking number four, American Jessica Pegula.Eeala, who in 2022 won the US Open in Single for Juniors, has trained at Rafael Nadal's academic academy at the Spanish Ø Mallorca since she was 13 years old. The family then made the difficult decision to send her daughter to Spain to develop. Brother Miko was also admitted to the Academy./ritzau/

title: Sparkede sovende mand i hovedet - og gik til købmanden efter øl
description: Anklager kræver otte års fængsel til 33-årig tiltalt i brutal dødsvoldssag fra Bedsted
title_translated: Kicked sleeping man in the head - and went to the grocery store after beer
description_translated: Prosecutor requires eight years in prison for 33-year-old indicted in brutal Death Wood Case from Bedsted

title: »Vi har sagt farvel til vores familier«, siger Vlad. »Vi er parat«, siger Viktor
description: Mens Donald Trump forsøger at skabe en slags fred i Ukraine, tager den ukrainske hær nye metoder i brug for at skaffe friske soldater til fronten. Det er ikke nemt at finde en ukrainer, der tror på Trumps projekt.
title_translated: "We have said goodbye to our families," says Vlad. "We're ready," says Viktor
description_translated: While Donald Trump is trying to create a kind of peace in Ukraine, the Ukrainian army is using new methods to get fresh soldiers to the front. Finding a Ukrainian who believes in Trump's project is not easy.

title: Venstre tøver på spørgsmål om blåt samarbejde efter Vanopslaghs skatteplan
description: I januar skrev frontfigurerne i den blå opposition en fælles kronik i Berlingske.»Der er et alternativ til regeringen og rød blok,« lød det. Et borgerligt alternativ.Partilederne fra Liberal Alliance, Danmarksdemokraterne, De Konservative og Dansk Folkeparti er ikke i tvivl om, at de sagtens kan blive enige om en ny politisk retning.Derfor er det opsigtsvækkende, at Alex Vanopslagh i et stort interview til Børsen fortæller om Liberal Alliances planer om at sænke skatterne markant, både for borgere og virksomheder.Det vil koste 47,7 milliarder kroner, som partiet vil finde gennem besparelser i den offentlige sektor.Det sidste kan de blå partier helt sikkert enes om. Men ikke én eneste gang nævnes det i partiledernes fælles kronik, at man vil sænke skatterne.Alligevel vil Vanopslagh nu have langt større skattelettelser, end hans forgænger Anders Samuelsen krævede, hvilket splittede den seneste blå regering.Derfor er spørgsmålet, om der overhovedet findes et seriøst borgerligt alternativ til SVM-regeringen.Venstres finansordfører, Hans Andersen, viger udenom, da Berlingske spørger.»Vi deler ambitionen om at gøre Danmark rigere og erhvervslivet mere konkurrencedygtigt. Så jeg er helt overbevist om, at Venstre og Liberal Alliance kan finde hinanden,« siger han.Men tror du på, at blå blok kan samle 90 mandater bag en fælles økonomisk politik?Hans Andersen holder en 11 sekunder lang pause, inden han svarer:»Jeg tager udspillet positivt ned. Der er flere konstruktive forslag.«Dansk Folkeparti er ikke vendt tilbage på Berlingskes henvendelser.Afvist af midterpartierneLiberal Alliance behøver ikke være afhængige af hele blå blok for at samle et flertal efter næste valg.I Børsen åbner Alex Vanopslagh således også for et »forpligtende samarbejde« med Moderaterne og Radikale Venstre.Men ifølge finansordføreren for Radikale Venstre skal Liberal Alliance ikke håbe på opbakning til de milliardstore skattelettelser, som partiet foreslår.»Jeg kan på ingen måde se mig selv eller Radikale Venstre i en plan, hvor Liberal Alliance vil skære så voldsomt,« siger Samira Nawa.Hun lægger ikke skjul på, at Radikale Venstre ofte samarbejder med Liberal Alliance, fordi de to partier er enige om mange ting på den økonomiske politik.Men både finansieringen og fordelingen i partiets nye plan er meget langt fra, hvad Samira Nawa kan stå inde for.»Flere elementer i planen er stik imod vores principper, heriblandt at skære i ulandsbistanden og forskningen. Vi ser heller ikke ens på, hvordan pengene skal bruges,« siger hun.Moderaternes finansordfører, Mohammad Rona, er mere positiv.»Liberal Alliance foreslår nu flere af de ting, som vi gik til valg på, herunder lavere selskabsskat og lavere skat på arbejde. Det vil gøre Danmark rigere og stærkere,« siger han.Et centralt punkt vækker dog undren.Liberal Alliance vil nemlig finde 22,3 milliarder kroner ved at skære i den offentlige administration.Det svarer til mere end 20.000 ansatte.»Jeg ved ikke, hvordan de når frem til de tal. Det ser jeg frem til at høre mere om, for det er et stort beløb,« siger Mohammad Rona.Du brokkede dig over, at Liberal Alliance stod uden for regeringens skattereform på grund af top-topskatten. Tror du på, at de er villige til at indgå kompromiser?»Det er et godt spørgsmål, som du må stille til Liberal Alliance. Vi kommer ikke til at kravle op i et træ.«DD: Gode takterHos Danmarksdemokraterne har man kun roser til overs for Liberal Alliances udspil.Ifølge partiets finansordfører, Dennis Flydtkjær, er det nemlig positivt, at partiet sætter fokus på noget andet end »krudt og kugler«.»Der er også andre vigtige ting i samfundet som for eksempel vores virksomheders konkurrenceevne,« siger han.Dennis Flydtkjær slår dog også fast, at han og Danmarksdemokraterne langt fra er enige i alle Alex Vanopslaghs forslag.»Det er jo helt naturligt, når vi er forskellige partier. Retningen er fin, og vi deler ambitionen om at skære i den offentlige administration,« siger han.Kommer I også til at gå til valg på massive skattelettelser?»Lige på det punkt kommer Liberal Alliance nok altid til at være mere ambitiøse end os. Men vi er helt med på at sænke skatten på arbejde, så vi kan godt enes efter et valg.«Spørgsmålet om skattelettelser har tidligere skabt stor splid i blå blok. Frygter du, at det samme kan ske igen?»Nej, det gør jeg egentlig ikke. Alle har lært, at man skal unde hinanden nogle sejre.«
title_translated: Left hesitates questions about blue cooperation after Vanopslagh's tax plan
description_translated: In January, the front figures in the blue opposition wrote a common chronicle in Berlingske. "There is an alternative to the government and red bloc," it read. A bourgeois alternative. The party leaders from the Liberal Alliance, the Danish Democrats, the Conservatives and the Danish People's Party have no doubt that they can easily agree on a new political direction. That is, it is startling that Alex Vanopslagh in a large interview with the Exchange tells about the Liberal Alliance's plans to lower taxes significantly, both for citizens and businesses. which the party will find through savings in the public sector. The last time the blue parties can certainly agree. But not a single time is it mentioned in the joint chronicle of the party leaders that one will lower taxes. Nevertheless, Vanopslagh will now have far greater tax cuts than his predecessor Anders Samuelsen demanded, which divided the latest blue government. shares the ambition to make Denmark richer and business more competitive. So I am absolutely convinced that the Left and the Liberal Alliance can find each other, "he says. But you believe that the blue bloc can gather 90 mandates behind a common economic policy? Hans Andersen is taking an 11 second break before he replies:" I take the play positively. There are several constructive proposals. ”The Danish People's Party has not returned to Berlingske's inquiries. Refused by the Middle Party Liberal Alliance does not have to depend on the entire blue block to gather a majority after the next election. The billion -dollar tax cuts proposed by the party. "I can in no way see myself or the Radical Left in a plan where the Liberal Alliance will cut so violently," says Samira Naw. She does not hide the fact that Radical Left often cooperates with the Liberal Alliance because the two parties agree on many things on the economic policy. From what Samira Nawa can stand for. ”Several elements of the plan are against our principles, including cutting in development assistance and research. We also do not look at how the money should be spent, ”she says. The moderates' financial spokesman Mohammad Rona is more positive.” The Liberal Alliance is now proposing more of the things we went to elections, including lower corporate tax and lower taxes at work. It will make Denmark richer and stronger, ”he says. A central point, however, arouses wonder. I look forward to hearing more about it, because it is a big amount, ”says Mohammad Rona.you complained that the Liberal Alliance was outside the government's tax reform due to the top top tax. Do you believe that they are willing to make compromises? ”This is a good question that you have to ask for the Liberal Alliance. We are not going to crawl up a tree. ”DD: Good Takterho's Danish Democrats If you have only roses for the Liberal Alliance's play. Coaling the party's finance mayor, Dennis Flydtkjær, it is positive that the party focuses on something other than" gunpowder and bullets. " However, Flydtkjær also states that he and the Danish Democrats are far from agreeing with all Alex Vanopslagh's proposals. ”It is quite natural when we are different parties. The direction is fine and we share the ambition to cut public administration, ”he says. If you also get to go to elections on massive tax cuts?” Just at that point, the Liberal Alliance will always be more ambitious than us. But we are fully involved in lowering the tax at work, so we can agree after an election. ”The question of tax cuts has previously created great divide in the blue block. Do you fear the same can happen again? ”No, I don't really. Everyone has learned that you have to enjoy each other some victories. "

title: - Det opfattes desværre som helt normalt at abortere
description: Jordemoder og psykoterapeut efterlyser større fokus på sene spontane aborter
title_translated: - Unfortunately, it is perceived as quite normal to abort
description_translated: Midwife and Psychotherapist calls for greater focus on late spontaneous abortions

title: Adam Holm »gnider sig i øjnene af vantro« over Trump: De eneste, som vinder på denne kurs, er Moskva og Beijing
description: Det er ikke længe siden, at USA og Europa var som siamesiske tvillinger. To hoveder, to kroppe, men synkrone bevægelser og en fælles skæbne.I dokumentarfilmen »Facing War«, der skildrer NATOs tidligere generalsekretær Jens Stoltenbergs sidste intense år på posten, mens krigen i Ukraine raser, ser man USAs daværende præsident, Joe Biden, tildele »The Presidential Medal for Freedom« til den højt respekterede nordmand.Ceremonien fandt sted i juli i fjor. Biden begrundede den prestigefulde pris til Stoltenberg, som havde stået i spidsen for den store forsvarsalliance siden 2014, med disse ord: »I dag fremtræder NATO stærkere, klogere og mere energisk, end da du begyndte. En milliard mennesker i Europa og Nordamerika – ja, hele verden – vil høste frugterne af dit arbejde i de kommende år«.Det lyder smukt, men allerede bedaget. Selvom Finland og Sverige er trådt ind i organisationen og bidrager til at byde det militært aggressive Rusland trods, er det »stærke, kloge og energiske« NATO truet indefra. Ikke af fremmede magters infiltration, men af USAs nye kurs.Det er ikke uden grund, at Anders Fogh Rasmussen, Stoltenbergs forgænger som generalsekretær, i en kronik her i bladet kalder udviklingen for »pinefuld«.Det er stærke ord, når de kommer fra en politiker, der i udenrigspolitikken er blevet set som et talerør for amerikanske interesser. Fogh Rasmussen har desværre ret.Forestillingen om at medlemmer af den samme alliance vil bakke hinanden op, eller i det mindste ikke åbenlyst så tvivl om organisationens nødvendighed og duelighed, er effektivt gjort til skamme af den mand, der tilsyneladende ikke har den ringeste skam i livet.Præsident Trump langede ud efter NATO tilbage i 2018, da han første gang var præsident. Ved den lejlighed gjorde han sig bemærket med udsagn om, at han ikke kunne forstå, hvorfor amerikanske tropper skulle sætte livet på spil i det nye medlemsland Montenegro, hvis det en dag kom under angreb.Ruslands præsident Putin, en mand, vi nu har rigeligt med eksempler på, at Trump respekterer, hvis ikke endda beundrer, var vred og fordømte optagelsen af den lille Balkan-stat.Trumps udfald mod den organisation, som hans eget land dengang og i dag er den største bidragsyder til, må have udløst højlydt latter og triumfbrøl i Kreml.At opleve lederen af klodens eneste reelle militære supermagt tage parti for Rusland imod Ukraine, kan få enhver til at gnide sig i øjnene af vantro. Det bliver ikke meget bedre af, at Trump er langt mindre offensiv i sine udfald mod Kina, end han er mod Europa som helhed.Her til lands – mere konkret i den grønlandske del af rigsfællesskabet – ser vi, hvordan den nyfundne amerikanske tilgang fungerer i praksis.USA har i henhold til »Forsvarsaftalen af 1951« vidtstrakt frihed til at styrke sin militære tilstedeværelse i Nordatlanten, som Trump ved gentagne lejligheder har betegnet som uhyre vigtige. Gode allierede ville naturligvis uden større diplomatiske sværdslag finde sammen om en udvidelse af den gældende aftale, hvis det måtte være nødvendigt.Men ikke Trump. Han anser tilsyneladende en alliance for at være en klods om benet. Han baserer sin politik på »transaktioner«, hvor han på samme måde som på ejendomsmarkedet kan indgå handler og jagte det størst mulige afkast. Alliancer indebærer forhandlinger, tilpasninger, kompromisser. Det er en langtrukken affære, som ikke huer den notorisk rastløse Trump.Den republikanske solkonges tilbagevenden til Det Hvide Hus har budt på en nærmest endeløs række af ubehagelige og foruroligende udmeldinger. Hans moralske kompas er for viderekomne, men det bliver direkte farligt, når han siger, at USA ikke vil komme til forsvar for lande, der har svært ved at overkomme forsvarsudgiftsmålene.De eneste, som vinder på denne kurs, er de autokratiske herskere i Moskva og Beijing. Tænk sig i det 21. århundrede at opleve, at lederen af den såkaldte »frie verden« frivilligt lægger sig i slipsporet af de kræfter, som bekæmper liberale principper om demokrati, ytringsfrihed og fri markedsøkonomi.Toppen af dette isbjerg er rygterne om, at USA ville trække sig fra sin rolle som øverst ansvarlig for NATOs militære tilstedeværelse i Europa, en post, som har været på amerikanske hænder, siden den firestjernede general og krigshelt, Dwight D. Eisenhower, introducerede den for 75 år siden.Med den form for »våbenbroderskab«, må man spørge, hvad man skal med fjender. Trumps USA er blevet til at akronym for: Utilregnelig Svigefuld Allieret. Vi har mistet vores tvilling.Adam Holm er journalist og forfatter
title_translated: Adam Holm "rubs in the eye of disbelief" over Trump: The only ones who win on this course are Moscow and Beijing
description_translated: It's not long ago that the US and Europe were like Siamese twins. Two heads, two bodies, but synchronous movements and a common fate. In the documentary "Facing War" depicting NATO's former Secretary -General Jens Stoltenberg's last intense year in the post, while the war in Ukraine is raging, the then -president of the United States, Joe Biden, sees "The Presidential Medal for Freedom" to the highly respected Norwegian. The bite justified the prestigious award to Stoltenberg, which had been at the forefront of the great defense alliance since 2014, with these words: “Today NATO appears stronger, wiser and more energetic than when you started. A billion people in Europe and North America - yes, the whole world - will reap the fruits of your work in the coming years. " Although Finland and Sweden have entered the organization and helps to offer militarily aggressive Russia despite, the "strong, wise and energetic" NATO is threatened from within. Not by the infiltration of foreign powers, but of the new course of the United States. It is not without reason that Anders Fogh Rasmussen, Stoltenberg's predecessor as Secretary General, in a chronicle here in the magazine calls the development "painful". It is strong words when they come from a politician who has been seen as a speaker for American interests. Unfortunately, Fogh Rasmussen is right. The performance that members of the same alliance will back each other up, or at least not obvious so doubt about the necessity and proficiency of the organization, has been effectively shamed by the man who apparently does not have the poorest shame in life. President Trump longed for NATO back in 2018 when he was first president. On that occasion, he made his mark that he could not understand why American troops should put his life at risk in the new Member State Montenegro, if one day it came under attack. And today the biggest contributor to, must have triggered loud laughter and triumphal roar in the Kremlin. To experience the leader of the globe's only real military superpower take party for Russia against Ukraine, can cause anyone to rub in the eye of disbelief. It does not get much better that Trump is far less offensive in his outcomes against China than he is against Europe as a whole. In this country - more concrete in the Greenlandic part of the Reich Community - we see how the newfound US approach works in practice. In accordance with the "Defense Agreement of 1951", the Freedom to strengthen its military presence in the North Atlant Important. Of course, good allies would, of course, without major diplomatic swords together on an extension of the current agreement if needed. But not Trump. He apparently considers an alliance to be a boulder around the leg. He bases his policy on "transactions", where he can, in the same way as in the real estate market, enter into trades and chase the greatest possible return. Alliances involve negotiations, adjustments, compromises. It is a far -reaching affair that does not hike the notoriously restless Trump. The Republican Sun King's return to the White House has offered an almost endless series of unpleasant and disturbing announcements. His moral compass is too advanced, but it becomes directly dangerous when he says the United States will not defend countries that have difficulty overcoming defense expenses. The only one who wins at this course are the autocratic rulers of Moscow and Beijing. Imagine in the 21st century to find that the leader of the so -called "free world" voluntarily lays in the tie trace of the forces that fight liberal principles of democracy, freedom of expression and free market economy. The top of this iceberg is rumored that the United States would withdraw from its role as at the top of NATO's military presence in Europe, a post. Four -star General and War Hero, Dwight D. Eisenhower, introduced it 75 years ago. With that kind of "weapon frozen", you have to ask what to do with enemies. Trump's United States has become acronymic for: unpredictable deceptive ally. We have lost our twin.Adam Holm is a journalist and writer

title: Overlæge foreslog en 10-års plan for psykiatrien. 6 år senere fælder hun en hård dom
description: Husker du Field’s? Det er et spørgsmål om tid, før samfundet igen bliver vidne til, at en borger med svær sindssygdom begår drab eller drabsforsøg. Sådan lyder advarslen fra overlægen, der tilbage i 2019 foreslog en 10-årsplan for psykiatrien. Dengang var hun optimist, i dag er hun nedslået.
title_translated: Chief physician suggested a 10-year plan for psychiatry. 6 years later she fells a tough judgment
description_translated: Do you remember Field's? It is a matter of time before society again witnesses that a citizen of severe insanity commits murder or attempted murder. This is the warning from the doctor, who back in 2019 proposed a 10-year plan for psychiatry. Back then she was optimistic, today she is down.

title: De garvede russere kørte amerikanerne rundt i manegen i 12 timer. Nu ved ingen, hvad USA endte med at love dem
description: Man kunne have sagt sig selv, hvordan det ville ende, når man så de to navne, Rusland sendte til forhandlinger i Riyadh. Den ene var den spionchef, der i årevis stod for at undergrave Ukraine indefra.Den anden mestrer fire sprog til en sådan grad af perfektion, at han angiveligt kan snyde dig lige godt på dem alle sammen.Sådan lyder kommentaren på X fra Rusland-eksperten Mark Galeotti oven på den særdeles mudrede våbenhvile, USA har forhandlet på plads med Rusland og Ukraine. »Det føles som lidt af et overfald,« skriver også Oliver Caroll, der er korrespondent for The Economist, om de forhandlinger, der bare skulle have været af teknisk karakter for at få detaljerne på plads.»I sidste ende brugte de erfarne russiske forhandlere 12 timer på at slide amerikanerne ned.«Endnu er der ingen, der ved, om der faktisk er aftalt en våbenhvile – og om den i givet fald allerede er trådt i kraft.Ukraine og Rusland beskylder allerede hinanden for at have overtrådt våbenhvilen.Og selvom det måske er ved at dæmre for USAs præsident, Donald Trump, at russerne »slæber på fødderne« på vej mod fred, er der en grund til, at han stadig føjer dem, konkluderer Mark Galeotti.Her er, hvad vi ved om våbenhvilen.Stop for angreb mod energianlægAllerede 18. marts blev Trump enig med Ruslands præsident, Vladimir Putin, om at stoppe for missil- og droneangreb mod energianlæg.USA mente, at aftalen ville træde i kraft »øjeblikkeligt« og både gælde energianlæg og civil infrastruktur.Og når Rusland allerede samme nat angreb et ukrainsk hospital og en transformerstation, var det angivelig, fordi de russiske droner allerede var i luften, da ordren fra Putin faldt, forklarede Trumps særlige udsending Steve Witkoff dagen efter til Bloomberg.»Russerne siger her til morgen, at syv af deres droner allerede var på vej, da Putin gav ordren, og at de blev skudt ned af russiske styrker selv. Så jeg hælder til at tro, at Putin handler i god tro,« sagde Steve Witkoff.Rusland erklærede på sin side, at våbenhvilen kun gjaldt »energiinfrastruktur« og ikke civil infrastruktur.Mens Ukraine i princippet bakkede op om en sådan våbenhvile, men først ville have officielt listet op, hvilke mål den omfattede. De lister har vi nu fået fra både russisk og ukrainsk side – og de gælder kun energianlæg.Våbenhvilen gælder i 30 dage, og ifølge gårsdagens russiske erklæring trådte den i kraft allerede 18. marts.Mens Ukraine fastholder, at våbenhvilen først trådte i kraft samme dag som erklæringerne, 25. marts.Våbenhvile i SortehavetRusland og Ukraine er også gået med til en våbenhvile i Sortehavet.USA og Ukraine mener, at aftalen træder i kraft med det samme.Mens Kreml hævder, at aftalen først træder i kraft efter ophævelsen af en række sanktioner og restriktioner forbundet til Ruslands produktion og eksport af fødevarer og gødning.Det har vakt stærk forargelse, hvis USA på den måde skal have lovet Rusland sanktionslettelser, inden en våbenhvile overhovedet er trådt i kraft.Tidligere har Trump-regeringen kun nævnt, at de kunne komme på tale på den anden side af en varig fredsaftale.Det mest bemærkelsesværdige er ifølge eksperterne kravet om, at den statslige landbrugsbank Rosselkhozbank bliver fjernet fra sanktionslisten og bliver genindlemmet i det globale betalingssystem SWIFT. Det ville være særdeles fordelagtigt for Rusland igen at få et smuthul til at føre penge frit ind og ud af landet, bemærker flere russiske eksperter til det undersøgende medie Vjorstka.USA er i sin erklæring kun gået med til at »hjælpe Rusland med at genvinde adgang til verdensmarkedet for eksport af fødevarer og gødning«.Formuleringen er så vag, så det er svært at sige, om USA faktisk er gået med til sanktionslettelser, siger Andrej Sizov, ekspert i korneksport i Sortehavet, til The Washington Post.I praksis ville det da også være umuligt at hæve de sanktioner, uden at EU går med til det, siger russiske eksperter til avisen Vedomosti.Fælden for TrumpReelt virker Putin ikke interesseret i fred, medmindre det bliver på hans betingelser, konstaterer Mark Galeotti i sin analyse for The Spectator.Derfor er Moskvas plan lige nu at trække tiden så meget som muligt, mens man trækker flest mulige indrømmelser ud af Ukraine og USA.»Så længe Trump er villig til at tro på, at en aftale er lige rundt om hjørnet, håber de på, han er villig til at fortsætte denne proces,« skriver Mark Galeotti.Samtidig forsøger Moskva at få det til at se ud, som om det er Ukraine – og nu måske EU – der står i vejen for en aftale. Ukraines præsident, Volodymyr Zelenskyj, har afvist at gå med til nogen form for sanktionslettelser – og at de i hans øjne allerede har lukket aftalen om en delvis våbenhvile:»Selv på selve forhandlingsdagen ser vi, hvordan russerne allerede er begyndt at manipulere. De prøver allerede at forvrænge aftalerne og faktisk bedrage både vores mellemled og hele verden,« sagde Zelenskyj tirsdag aften.Direkte adspurgt medgiver Trump, at russerne måske er i gang med trække tiden ud.»Jeg har selv gjort det gennem tiden,« medgiver Trump, når der var en kontrakt, han hverken ville skrive under på eller afvise helt.Men han tror stadig på, at Putin er klar på en våbenhvile.Og han er ikke afvisende over for, at Putin allerede nu kan få sanktionslettelser – mens missilerne stadig flyver:»Vi er i gang med at se på alle deres betingelser lige nu,« siger Trump. Selv hvis Trump en dag skulle miste tålmodigheden med Putin, kan det blive svært for ham nu at forlade processen, skriver Mark Galeotti i sin analyse:»Det kan gøre ham selv sårbar over for anklager om at være naiv eller, hvad der er endnu værre i hans verden, en dårlig forhandler.«Emil Rottbøll er Berlingskes Rusland-korrespondent
title_translated: The tanned Russians drove the Americans around the mane for 12 hours. Now nobody knows what the US ended up promising them
description_translated: You could have told yourself how it would end when you saw the two names Russia sent to negotiations in Riyadh. One was the spy chief who for years was undermining Ukraine inside. The second one mastered four languages ​​to such a degree of perfection that he can allegedly cheat you equally well on them all. This is the comment on X from Russia expert Mark Galeotti on top of the extremely muddy ceasefire, the US has negotiated with Russia and Ukraine. "It feels like a bit of an assault," writes Oliver Caroll, a correspondent for The Economist, about the negotiations that should have just been of a technical nature to get the details in place. "In the end, the experienced Russian dealers spent 12 hours sliding down Americans." No one knows if a ceasefire has already been agreed. Already each other for violating the ceasefire. And while it may be diminishing for US President Donald Trump, that the Russians "drag on his feet" on his way to peace, there is a reason why he still adds them, concludes Mark Galeotti. Her is what we know about the ceasefire. Putin, to stop for missile and drone attacks against energy plants.usa believed that the agreement would come into force "immediately" and both apply to energy and civil infrastructure. And when Russia already attacked a Ukrainian hospital and a transformer station, it was allegedly because the Russian drones were already in the air when the order from Putin fell, explained Trump's special Witkoff the next day to Bloomberg. ”The Russians say this morning that seven of their drones were already on their way when Putin gave the order and that they were shot down by Russian forces themselves. So I lean to believe that Putin is acting in good faith, "said Steve Witkoff.rusland, for its part, declared that the ceasefire only applied to" energy infrastructure "and not civil infrastructure. In principle, the Ukraine backed up such a ceasefire, but would have officially listed what goals it included. We have now received the lists from both Russian and Ukrainian - and they only apply to energy plants. Ukraine believes that the agreement will take effect immediately. If the Kremlin claims that the agreement will only come into force after the abolition of a number of sanctions and restrictions associated with Russia's production and export of food and fertilizer. It has caused strong indignation if the United States must have promised Russia sanctions before a ceasefire has been at all. Only mentioned that they could come up on the other side of a lasting peace agreement. The most notable is, according to the experts, the requirement that the state agricultural bank Rosselkhozbank is removed from the sanction list and will be re -enclosed in the global payment system Swift. It would be extremely advantageous for Russia to get a loophole again to lead money freely in and out of the country, more Russian experts to the investigative media Vjorstk.usa has only agreed to "help Russia regain access to the world market for exporting food and fertilizer". Andrej Sizov, expert in grain exports in the Black Sea, to The Washington Post. In practice, it would also be impossible to raise those sanctions without the EU agreeing to it, Russian experts told the newspaper Vedomosti. The trump role does not seem interested in peace, unless it becomes his conditions, Mark Galeotti notes in his analysis for the spectator. Pulling the time as much as possible while drawing as many concessions as possible out of Ukraine and the United States. "As long as Trump is willing to believe that a deal is just around the corner, they hope he is willing to continue this process," Mark Galeotti writes. Ukraine President Volodymyr Zelenskyj has refused to agree to any kind of sanctions - and that in his eyes they have already closed the agreement on a partial ceasefire: "Even on the negotiation day we see how the Russians have already begun to manipulate. They are already trying to distort the agreements and actually deceive both our intermediaries and the whole world, "Zelensky said Tuesday evening. Directly asked Trump that the Russians may have been pulling out time." I have done it over time, "Trump admits when there was a contract he would neither sign or reject completely. But he still believes that Putin is ready for a gun. Putin can already get sanctions - while the missiles are still flying: "We are looking at all their conditions right now," Trump says. Even if Trump was one day losing patience with Putin, it can be difficult for him to leave the process now, Mark Galeotti writes in his analysis: "It can make him vulnerable to charges of being naive or what's even worse in his world, a bad dealer." Emil Rottbøll is Berlingsk's Russia correspondent

title: 32-årig mand sigtet for drab på 42-årig polak i Københoved
description: En 32-årig mand, der blev anholdt i Ribe natten til onsdag, er sigtet for at have dræbt en 42-årig polsk statsborger, som blev fundet død søndag morgen i et grønt område i Københoved i Vejen Kommune.Det skriver Syd- og Sønderjyllands Politi i en pressemeddelelse, efter at den 32-årige er blevet varetægtsfængslet i fire uger efter et grundlovsforhør onsdag ved Retten i Esbjerg.Den 32-årige er sigtet for i forening "med en eller flere medgerningspersoner at have dræbt" den 42-årige. Derudover er han sigtet for usømmelig omgang med lig.Han nægter sig skyldig i begge dele, oplyser hans forsvarer Birgit Østergaard Nielsen ifølge Ekstra Bladet.Siden anmeldelsen om drabet søndag har politiet "haft en massiv og koordineret operativ og efterforskningsmæssig indsats", lyder det i meddelelsen.Den indsats er fortsat i gang, da politiet formoder, at flere gerningspersoner har været involveret i drabet.I forbindelse med efterforskningen har politiet været til steder på forskellige adresser, og er det fortsat.Det er adresser i Lindknud, Vejen, Rødding og Esbjerg.Politiet var i begyndelsen af ugen til stede i Lindknud. Onsdag er kriminalteknikere og politifolk til stede i et område ved Askevej i Vejen og en adresse på Sommerlyst i Rødding.- Politiet ransager på stederne og sikrer eventuelle spor, da efterforskningen har vist, at stederne kan have relation til drabssagen, skriver politiet.Politiet forventer at foretage yderligere undersøgelser i Vejen torsdag, hvorfor der i den forbindelse kan være mindre afspærringer.Vicepolitiinspektør ved Syd- og Sønderjyllands Politi Brian Skovrup Christensen takker borgerne for forståelse i forbindelse med afspærringer.Derudover efterlyser han oplysninger og videoovervågning fra borgere.- Det er afgørende, at vi får den betydningsfulde hjælp fra borgerne, når vi beder om det. Det er oplysninger, som kan være relevante i forhold til vores efterforskning af drabssagen, siger han i meddelelsen./ritzau/
title_translated: 32-year-old man charged with murder of 42-year-old pole in Copenhagen
description_translated: A 32-year-old man who was arrested in Ribe on the night of Wednesday is charged with killing a 42-year-old Polish citizen, who was found dead on Sunday morning in a green area in Copenhagen in Vejen Municipality. It writes South and South Jutland Police in a press release after the 32-year-old has been custody for four weeks after a constitutional "With one or more fellow workers to have killed" the 42-year-old. In addition, he is charged with unseemly dealing with corpses. He pleads guilty to both, says his defender Birgit Østergaard Nielsen according to Ekstra Bladet. Since the notification of the murder on Sunday, the police have "had a massive and coordinated operative and investigative efforts", the message says. And it remains. These are addresses in Lindknud, Vejen, Rødding and Esbjerg. The police were present at Lindknud at the beginning of the week. On Wednesday, forensic technicians and police officers are present in an area at Askevej in Vejen and an address at Sommerlyst in Rødding. Police Brian Skovrup Christensen thanks citizens for understanding in connection with barriers. It is information that may be relevant to our investigation of the murder case, he says in the message./ritzau/

title: Zelenskyj og Macron afviser europæiske soldater i frontlinjen i Ukraine
description: Udsendte europæiske soldater skal være i anden linje og afskrække Rusland fra nye angreb, siger Macron.
title_translated: Zelenskyj and Macron reject European soldiers in the front line of Ukraine
description_translated: Posted European soldiers must be in the second line and discourage Russia from new attacks, says Macron.

title: DR-stjerne og rockveteraner hædret til prisuddeling
description: Aphaca blev aftenens store vinder til Gaffaprisen 2025. Der var også statuetter til Onkel Reje og D-A-D.
title_translated: DR star and rock veterans honored for awards ceremony
description_translated: APHACA became the big winner of the evening for the fork prize 2025. There were also statuettes for Uncle Shrimp and D-A-D.

title: Dansker medvirker i Real Madrids Champions League-kollaps
description: Signe Bruun, Caroline Møller og resten af spillerne på Real Madrids kvindehold i fodbold må følge sæsonens afgørelse i Champions League hjemme foran fjernsynet.Den spanske storklub havde ellers et godt udgangspunkt i kvartfinaleduellen mod Arsenal, men efter at have vundet 2-0 på hjemmebane tabte Real Madrid onsdag aften med 0-3 i London og er dermed ude af turneringen.I løbet af de første 14 minutter i anden halvleg scorede Arsenal tre gange og tvang Real Madrid frem på banen.Alessia Russo scorede Arsenals første og sidste mål. Russo fik bolden i mål igen i det 71. minut, men efter et VAR-tjek blev scoringen annulleret.Signe Bruun startede atter inde som Real Madrids spidsangriber, men hun blev skiftet ud efter 76 minutters spil, da holdet desperat manglede et mål. Caroline Møller sad på Real Madrids bænk i hele opgøret.Landsholdsanfører Pernille Harder bliver heller ikke en del af turneringens semifinaler.Sammen med Bayern München må hun forlade Champions League efter et samlet 1-6-nederlag til franske Lyon.Tyskerne havde tabt 0-2 på hjemmebane, og onsdag aften tabte Bayern så med 1-4 på udebane. Harder startede inde og kunne se sit hold tage føringen, før Lyon strammede grebet.Danskeren blev udskiftet midt i anden halvleg, da Bayern var bagud 1-3 og uden chance for at gå videre./ritzau/
title_translated: Dane participates in Real Madrid's Champions League collapse
description_translated: Signe Bruun, Caroline Møller and the rest of the players on Real Madrid's women's team in football must follow the season's decision in the Champions League at home in front of the television. The Spanish big club had a good starting point in the quarter-final duel against Arsenal, but after winning 2-0 at home lost Real Madrid on Wednesday night with 0-3 in London and is thus out of the tournament. Scored Arsenal three times and forced Real Madrid on the field. The Aalessia Russo scored Arsenal's first and last goal. Russo got the ball into goal again in the 71st minute, but after a VAR check the scoring was canceled. Signe Bruun started again as Real Madrid's tip striker, but she was replaced after 76 minutes of play when the team desperately lacked a goal. Caroline Møller sat on Real Madrid's bench throughout the match. National team leader Pernille Harder also does not become part of the tournament's semi-finals. Together with Bayern Munich, she has to leave the Champions League after a total 1-6 defeat to the French Lyon. Harder started inside and could see his team take the lead before Lyon tightened the grip. The dancer was replaced in the middle of the second half as Bayern was behind 1-3 and without a chance to move on./ritzau/

title: Trump vil indføre 25 procent told på udenlandske biler
description: Biler, der ikke produceres i USA, skal pålægges told på 25 procent, siger USA’s præsident onsdag aften.
title_translated: Trump will introduce 25 percent duty on foreign cars
description_translated: Cars not produced in the United States must be imposed on 25 percent duty, the US President said Wednesday night.

title: Disse 33 sekunder rummer alt det, vi frygter nu
description: Hvad vil du spille for at få din ven til at elske klassisk musik? Det skriver musikredaktør Thomas Michelsen om i denne serie. Denne gang den engelske komponist Gustav Holst, der chokerede sin samtid med ’Planeterne’. I dag er det noget af det mest populære klassiske musik. Men truslen er blevet reel igen.
title_translated: These 33 seconds hold all that we fear now
description_translated: What do you want to play to make your friend love classical music? That's what music editor Thomas Michelsen writes about in this series. This time the English composer Gustav Holst, who shocked his time with the 'planets'. Today it is one of the most popular classical music. But the threat has become real again.

title: Suveræn Lasse Andersson overstråler Gidsel i CL-triumf
description: Takket være en storspillende dansker står Füchse Berlin med rigtig gode kort på hånden i jagten på en plads i Champions Leagues kvartfinaler.Men hvor det normalt er Mathias Gidsel, der løber med overskrifterne, var det onsdag Lasse Andersson, der var berlinernes store profil i den første playoffkamp ude mod polske Kielce.Den danske verdensmester scorede hele 13 mål, da Füchse Berlin vandt 33-27 efter at have være bagud med to mål ved pausen. Mathias Gidsel blev noteret for fire mål på otte forsøg.Vinder Füchse Berlin samlet, venter Aalborg Håndbold i kvartfinalerne i slutningen af april.Tidligt i onsdagens opgør måtte Mathias Gidsel til behandling på sidelinjen, men danskeren vendte hurtigt tilbage på banen.Her havde han og holdkammeraterne det vanskeligt i første halvleg i den polske heksekedel. Gidsel blev holdt i kort snor, og danskeren noterede sig kun for enkelt scoring før pausen.Havde det ikke været for en særdeles stærk Lasse Andersson, der scorede seks gange i første halvleg, ville Füchse Berlin have haft et vanskeligere udgangspunkt efter de første 30 minutter. Ved pausen førte hjemmeholdet 14-12.Efter sidebyttet fortsatte Andersson storspillet, imens holdkammeraterne også løftede sig gevaldigt. Tyskerne overtog føringen, og imens mistede hjemmeholdets spillere modet og får nu yderst svært ved at vinde samlet.Der er returkamp i Berlin onsdag i næste uge.Magdeburg står også med et ben i turneringens kvartfinaler.Onsdag aften vandt den tyske mesterklub med 30-26 ude over rumænske Dinamo Bucuresti.Landsholdsanfører Magnus Saugstrup noterede sig for fire scoringer, da han sammen med holdkammeraterne sikrede sig et gunstigt udgangspunkt inden næste uges returkamp på hjemmebane./ritzau/
title_translated: Superb Lasse Andersson overdoors hostage in CL-Triumf
description_translated: Thanks to a big -playing Dane, Füchse Berlin stands with really good cards on hand in the hunt for a place in the Champions League quarterfinals. But where it is usually Mathias hostel running with the headlines, it was Lasse Andersson on Wednesday, the Berlin's big profile in the first playoff match against Polish Kielce. 33-27 after being behind with two goals at the break. Mathias Hostel was noted for four goals on eight trials. Winner Füchse Berlin overall, Aalborg Handball waits in the quarterfinals at the end of April. Early in Wednesday's showdown, Mathias hostage to treatment on the sidelines, but the Dane quickly returned to the field. Hostage was held on a short leash, and the Dane noted only for single scoring before the break. If it had not been for a very strong Lasse Andersson, who scored six times in the first half, Füchse Berlin would have had a more difficult starting point after the first 30 minutes. At the break, the home team led 14-12. After the side swap, Andersson continued the big game, while the teammates also lifted themselves tremendously. The Germans took over the lead and while the home team's players lost their courage and are now finding extremely difficult to win together. There is a return game in Berlin on Wednesday next week. Magdeburg also stands with a leg in the tournament's quarterfinals. Wnians Day evening the German champion club won by 30-26 over Romanian Dinamo Bucuresti. The teammates secured a favorable starting point before next week's return game at home./ritzau/

title: Grand tours udvides med et ekstra cykelhold
description: Trækker Uno-X eller det nystartede Tudor sorteper i jagten på et wildcard til Tour de France?Det spørgsmål optager mange cykelentusiaster, men svaret er med al sandsynlighed, at der alligevel er plads til begge hold på de franske landeveje.Et flertal i The Professional Cycling Council (PCC) - rådet for professionel cykling - har sagt ja til at udvide antallet af deltagende hold i de tre grand tours fra 22 til 23 med omgående virkning. Det samlede antal ryttere stiger fra 176 til 184 ryttere.Forslaget er nu sendt videre til beslutningsorganet i Den Internationale Cykelunion (UCI), som formelt skal tage stilling til spørgsmålet 31. marts. Det skriver UCI på sin hjemmeside.Giver UCI som ventet grønt lys til forslaget, skal der uddeles et wildcard mere end tidligere til cykelsæsonens tre største løb.Ud over de 18 World Tour-hold er Lotto og Israel-Premier Tech fra det næstøverste holdlag også garanteret en Tour-start.Det er fordelingen af de sidste to pladser, der har skabt debat og usikkerhed. På nuværende tidspunkt af sæsonen plejer der at være uddelt wildcards.Normalt går det ene wildcard til et fransk hold, og det vil utvivlsomt blive tildelt TotalEnergies.De seneste to år har Uno-X fået det andet, men i år er det schweiziske Tudor-mandskab alvorligt inde i billedet, fordi det kan stille med den franske folkehelt Julian Alaphilippe. Nu ser problemet ud til at have løst sig selv./ritzau/
title_translated: Grand Tours is expanded with an additional cycling team
description_translated: Pulls Uno -X or the newly started Tudor Sorteper in the hunt for a wildcard for the Tour de France with immediate effect. The total number of riders is rising from 176 to 184 riders. The proposal has now been passed on to the decision -making body in the International Bicycle Union (UCI), which must formally address the question 31 March. It writes UCI on its website. As expected green light for the proposal, a wildcard must be awarded more than before for the three largest races of the cycling season. Over the 18 World Tour teams, Lotto and Israel Premier Tech from the second-oak team layer are also guaranteed a Tour-start. At present, WildCardsally, one wildcard goes to a French team, and it will undoubtedly be awarded total energy. Now the problem seems to have resolved itself./ritzau/

title: Trump-trusler »virker meget stærkt« – bilgigant investerer trecifret milliardbeløb i USA
description: Donald Trump har ved flere lejligheder raslet med sablen og truet udenlandske bilgiganter med told.En handelskrig, der ser ud til at blive en realitet og kan ramme en række af verdens største bilproducenter, som leverer millioner af biler til USA.Mens nogle endnu ikke har planlagt et modtræk, har andre annonceret milliardinvesteringer i USA, der skal afbøde konsekvenserne af de fremtidige importafgifter.Senest har den sydkoreanske bilproducent Hyundai slået fast, at virksomheden vil investere 21 milliarder dollar – svarende til over 145 milliarder danske kroner – i sin amerikanske produktion.Det skriver BBC.Hyundai vil blandt andet opføre et stålværk i staten Louisiana. Det kommer til at beskæftige mere end 1400 ansatte – og det bliver bemærket i Det Hvide Hus.»Denne investering er en klar demonstration af, at told virker meget stærkt,« har Trump sagt ifølge BBC.Investeringerne i netop et stålværk kommer i kølvandet af en varslet 25-procents told på stål og aluminium, der kommer ind i USA.Dertil kommer en varslet 25-procents told på varer fra Mexico og Canada, hvor mange producenter har fabrikker og samler bilerne, inden de kommer ind i USA.Derudover har præsident Trump varslet told direkte på import af køretøjer.Og det har fået flere virksomheder i bilindustrien til at planlægge massive investeringer i USA.Det har de gjort i en tid, hvor præsidenten flere gange har italesat et ønske om, at amerikanerne skal køre amerikansk.Har fået et valgEn række bilgiganter var ellers optimistiske forud for Trumps indtræden, men står nu foran told og afgifter, der kan skade indtjeningen.Ifølge The New York Times har Trump-administrationen annonceret, at lande, der har et stort handelsoverskud i forhold til USA, vil blive ramt af told til april.Et stort handelsoverskud har blandt andet Japan, og tolden forventes i stort omfang at ramme den japanske bilproduktion.USA er nemlig det største marked for en række giganter som Toyota, Honda, Nissan og Subaru, skriver mediet.Den nu forsvundne optimisme skyldtes, at Trump før valget førte kampagne imod den amerikanske bilindustris skift fra fossile brændstoffer. Her stod Toyota og andre førende producenter af hybrid- og elbiler klar i kulissen til at tage yderligere markedsandele i USA.Det fik eksempelvis Toyota til at donere én million dollar til Trumps indsættelse i januar, skriver The New York Times.Nu står Toyota og andre ifølge mediet over for valget mellem at foretage nye investeringer i USA eller risikere massive potentielle tab som følge af Trumps toldtrusler.
title_translated: Trump threats "Works Very Strong"-Car giant invests three-digit billions in the United States
description_translated: Donald Trump has on several occasions rattled with the saber and threatened foreign car giants with duties. A trade war, which appears to be a reality and can hit a number of the world's largest car manufacturers who supply millions of cars to the USA. Me some have not yet planned a counter -drag, others have announced billion investments in the United States, which must mitigate the consequences of the future imports. South Korean car manufacturer Hyundai stated that the company will invest $ 21 billion - equivalent to over DKK 145 billion - in its American production. It writes BBC.Hyundai will, among other things, build a steel plant in the state of Louisiana. It's going to employ more than 1400 employees-and it's noticed in the White House. "This investment is a clear demonstration that customs work is very strong," Trump said, according to the BBC. Investments in just a steel plant come in the wake of a notified 25-percent duty on steel and aluminum coming into the US. Canada, where many manufacturers have factories and collect the cars before entering the United States. Entry, but now stands in front of customs duties that could damage earnings. According to the New York Times, the Trump administration has announced that countries that have a large trade surplus compared to the United States will be affected by customs to April. A large trade surplus has, among other things, Japan, and customs are expected to hit the Japanese car production to a large extent. Honda, Nissan and Subaru, write the media. The now -defunct optimism was due to the fact that Trump was campaigning before the election against the American car industry's shift from fossil fuels. Here, Toyota and other leading producers of hybrid and electric cars were ready in the backdrop to take additional market shares in the USA. This, for example, caused Toyota to donate one million dollars to Trump's deployment in January, writes The New York Times. Now Toyota and others are facing the media against the election between making new investments in the United States or risking massive potential losses as a result of Trump's Tolder Truses.

title: Vigtig Trump-figur med tråde til Grønland stod bag Usha Vances invitation til hundeslædevæddeløb
description: Siden nyheden ryddede flader i søndags har der hersket forvirring: Hvem inviterede den amerikanske andendame, Usha Vance, til Grønland for blandt andet at overvære et hundeslædevæddeløb i Sisimiut?Det var ikke Danmark eller Grønland, der har kaldt besøget uacceptabelt.Pilen har de seneste dage i stedet peget på hundeslædeorganisationen KNQK, som både har beklaget den politiske palaver, men også erkendt at have modtaget amerikansk støtte til væddeløbet via USAs konsulat i Nuuk.Men nu afslører en af Donald Trumps vigtigste figurer med tråde til Grønland, at han med sin organisation American Daybreak har spillet en helt afgørende rolle i invitationen, der har ført til en historisk krise mellem Danmark og USA.Den amerikanske forretningsmand Tom Dans skriver i et opslag på X, at han siden januar har arbejdet på at finde det helt rigtige event, som kunne danne ramme om et højtstående amerikansk besøg.Her blev hundeslædevæddeløbet identificeret, som »en fremragende mulighed«, som det lyder i opslaget. »Som sponsor og tilhænger af denne begivenhed opfordrede og inviterede jeg andendamen (Usha Vance, red.) og andre højtstående medlemmer af administrationen til at deltage i dette monumentale løb,« skriver Dans.Tæt samarbejdeDen amerikanske forretningsmand skriver også, at han har arbejdet tæt sammen med arrangørerne bag hundeslædevæddeløbet.Siden januar har de været i regelmæssig kontakt, og »sammen« har de »længe planlagt en mulig tur for amerikanske kultur-, erhvervs- og regeringsledere«. »I begyndelsen af marts inviterede vi andendamen (Usha Vance, red.) og andre højtstående medlemmer af administrationen til at (...) opleve denne unikke og spændende kulturelle begivenhed,« hedder det også i opslaget.Han skriver både »jeg« og »vi« og fastslår dermed ikke entydigt at have stået bag invitationen alene. Men det står klart, at en af Trumps vigtigste personer med tråde til Grønland har spillet en afgørende rolle i at facilitere, at det overhovedet kunne komme på tale, og at han har været med til at invitere og opfordre til besøget.Tom Dans er af det grønlandske public service-medie KNR blevet kaldt »Trumps sande mand i Grønland«.Under Trumps første præsidentperiode blev han udpeget som arktisk kommissær, og han er tidligere rådgiver i det amerikanske finansministerium, men han er ikke en del af Trump-administrationen i dag.Han spiller dog på sin vis en central rolle i den amerikanske præsidents grønlandske tilnærmelser gennem organisationen American Daybreak, der arbejder aktivt for at fremme amerikanske interesser på verdens største ø.»Mange har spurgt til American Daybreak og vores rolle i andendamens foreslåede rejse til Grønland i denne uge. Jeg følte, at det var vigtigt at dele nogle tanker med jer på vores vegne,« skriver han selv indledningsvis i opslaget på X.KNR skrev tirsdag, at det var arrangøren af hundeslædeløbet, der stod bag den amerikanske invitation.Men onsdag lyder det i en ny artikel fra mediet, at invitationen i hvert fald aldrig blev sendt til forsvarsminister Pete Hegseth – den blev blot sendt i udkast. »En invitation til Pete Hegseth blev sendt til Selvstyret. Fra Selvstyret fik vi en forklaring om, at man derfra ikke kan sende invitationen, og derfor afsluttede vi denne sag,« siger hundeslædeorganisationen KNQK.»Vi skal understrege, at vi handlede i god tro, da vi indvilgede i at modtage støtte, for at kunne gennemføre Avannaata Qimussersua, (det landsdækkende hundeslædeløb),« lyder det videre fra KNQK.Den amerikanske andendame skulle have været del af en større delegation, der blandt andet skulle besøge både Nuuk og Sisimiut. Hun skulle have overværet hundeslædevæddeløbet i selskab med USAs nationale sikkerhedsrådgiver, Mike Waltz, og den amerikanske energiminister, Chris Wright.Men tirsdag blev planerne som bekendt ændret. Nu er det USAs vicepræsident, J.D. Vance, og hans hustru, som besøger den amerikanske militærbase Pituffik Space Base, tidligere kendt som Thulebasen, og det er uklart, hvorvidt Mike Waltz og Chris Wright også deltager.
title_translated: Important Trump figure with threads to Greenland was behind USHA Vancer's invitation to dog sled races
description_translated: Since the news cleared surfaces on Sunday, there has been confusion: Who invited the US second lady, Usha Vance, to Greenland to, among other things, attend a dog sledding in Sisimiut? It was not Denmark or Greenland who has called the visit unacceptable. Received US support for the race via US Consulate in Nuuk. But now one of Donald Trump's most important figures with threads to Greenland reveals that with his organization American Daybreak he has played a crucial role in the invitation that has led to a historic crisis between Denmark and the US. the dog sledding was identified as "an excellent option" as it sounds in the posting. "As a sponsor and supporter of this event, I urged and invited the second lady (USHA VANCE, ed.) And other senior members of the administration to participate in this monumental race," writes Dans.Tear Collaboration American businessman also writes that he has worked closely with the organizers behind the dog sledding. Government leaders'. "At the beginning of March we invited the second lady (USA Vance, ed.) And other senior members of the administration to (...) experience this unique and exciting cultural event," it also states in the post. He writes both "I" and "we" and thus does not clearly establish to have been behind the invitation alone. But it is clear that one of Trump's most important persons with threads to Greenland has played a crucial role in facilitating that it could come up at all and that he has been inviting and calling for the visit. Tom Dance has been named by Greenland's Public Service media KNR "Trump's true man in Greenland". in the US Ministry of Finance, but he is not part of the Trump administration today. However, he plays a key role in the US president's Greenlandic approaches through the American Daybreak organization, which works actively to promote US interests on the world's largest island. I felt it was important to share some thoughts with you on our behalf, ”he writes himself initially in the posting at X.SKRR wrote on Tuesday that it was the organizer of the dog slope who was behind the US invitation. But on Wednesday, a new article from the media says the invitation was at least never sent to Defense Minister Pete Hegeth - it was simply sent to draft. »An invitation to Pete Hegeth was sent to the Self -Government. From the Self -Government we got an explanation that we cannot send the invitation from there, and so we ended this case, "says the dog sled organization KNQK. Delegation, which was to visit both Nuuk and Sisimiut. She should have attended the dog sledding in the company of US National Security Advisor Mike Waltz, and US energy minister Chris Wright. But on Tuesday, the plans were known as you know. Now it is the US Vice President, J.D. Vance, and his wife, who visits the US military base Pituffik Space Base, formerly known as the Thule base, and it is unclear whether Mike Waltz and Chris Wright also participate.

title: Nato-chef: Fire amerikanske soldater er forsvundet i Litauen
description: Fire amerikanske soldater er blevet væk under en militærøvelse i Litauen.Det oplyser den amerikanske ambassade i landet i et opslag på Facebook onsdag.Ifølge ambassaden er soldaterne blevet væk i et militært træningsområde omkring Pabrade i den østlige del af landet tæt på grænsen til Belarus.Onsdag aften bekræfter en talsperson for Natos generalsekretær, Mark Rutte, at soldaterne stadig er savnede.Tidligere lød det ellers fra generalsekretæren, at soldaterne skulle være døde, men over for AFP forklarer talspersonen, at det var en misforståelse.- Generalsekretæren henviste til nyhedsrapporter, der netop var dukket op. Han bekræftede ikke de fire amerikanske soldaters død, men bemærkede, at detaljerne stadig er ubekræftede, siger talsperson Allison Hart til mediet.Flere litauiske medier, herunder public service-mediet LRT, har ligeledes tidligere onsdag skrevet, at soldaterne menes at være døde.Det litauiske forsvar modtog en anmeldelse om soldaternes forsvinden tirsdag omkring klokken 16.45. Derudover var et bæltekøretøj også blevet væk.Bæltekøretøjet er blevet fundet i en sump, oplyser den amerikanske hær ifølge AFP og tilføjer, at eftersøgningen af soldaterne stadig er i gang.Både amerikanske og litauiske soldater samt litauiske myndigheder deltager i en redningsaktion, der begyndte tirsdag.Helikoptere fra det litauiske flyvevåben indgår også i eftersøgningsarbejdet.- Jeg vil gerne personligt takke de litauiske væbnede styrker og de første respondenter, der hurtigt kom for at hjælpe os i vores eftersøgningsoperation, siger den amerikanske generalløjtnant Charles Costanza, skriver nyhedsbureauet AFP.Litauens forsvarsminister, Dovile Sakaliene, meddelte onsdag, at hun vil tage til træningsområdet ved Pabrade.- Ministeren tager dertil for at inspicere eftersøgnings- og redningsarbejdet og for at vise solidaritet med amerikanerne, sagde en talsmand fra forsvarsministerens kontor ifølge LRT.Flere end 1000 amerikanske soldater er på skift udstationeret i Litauen./ritzau/
title_translated: NATO chief: Four American soldiers have disappeared in Lithuania
description_translated: Four American soldiers have gone away during a military exercise in Lithuania. It states the US embassy in the country in a Facebook post on Wednesday. According to the embassy, ​​the soldiers have gone away in a military training area around Pabrade in the eastern part of the country close to the border with Belarus. Wednesday evening confirms a spokesman for NATO's secretary secretary, Mark Rutte, Mark Rutte. The Secretary-General that the soldiers should have died, but to AFP, the spokesperson explains that it was a misunderstanding.- The Secretary-General referred to news reports that had just appeared. He did not confirm the death of the four American soldiers, but noticed that the details are still unconfirmed, spokesman Allison Hart told the media. More Lithuanian media, including the public service media LRT, has also written earlier Wednesday that the soldiers are believed to be dead. The Lithuanian defense received a report of the soldiers' disappearance on Tuesday at about 16:45. In addition, a belt vehicle had also gone away. The belt vehicle has been found in a swamp, the US Army said, according to AFP, adding that the search for the soldiers is still in progress. Both US and Lithuanian soldiers as well as Lithuanian authorities participate in a rescue operation that began on Tuesday. Armed Forces and the first respondents who quickly came to help us in our search operation, says US Lieutenant General Charles Costanza, writes the news agency AFP. Lithuania's Defense Minister, Dovile Sakalien, announced on Wednesday that she will go to the training area at Pabrade.- The Minister goes to inspect the search and rescue work and the rescue work. The Americans, said a spokesman from the Defense Minister's office, according to LRT.more than 1000 US soldiers are alternately posted in Lithuania./ritzau/

title: Løkke inden Vance-besøg i Grønland: Brug for vidensniveauet vokser
description: Når USA's vicepræsident, J.D. Vance, fredag besøger militærbasen Pituffik Space Base, håber udenrigsminister Lars Løkke Rasmussen (M), at vicepræsidenten får "en god briefing".- For der er også brug for, at vidensniveauet vokser i den her sag, siger Lars Løkke torsdag eftermiddag efter et møde i Det Udenrigspolitiske Nævn.Han nævner herefter et eksempel på, hvad han ser som en falsk fortælling i USA om Grønland.- Vi kan ikke genkende billedet, som man fornemmer visse steder i det amerikanske politiske miljø, at Grønland er sådan et sted, der er fyldt med kinesiske investeringer. Mig bekendt er der nul.- Så det er da kun godt, hvis folk tager ud, får briefinger og bliver klogere på, hvad der er op og ned, siger Lars Løkke.Han påpeger også, at det planlagte amerikanske "charmebesøg i det grønlandske samfund" blev aflyst til fordel for besøget på den amerikanske militærbase.- Det bliver man da nødt til helt analytisk at tage ned som et udtryk for, at der nok er en eller anden i USA, der har fanget, at det narrativ om, at der stod en grønlandsk befolkning med vidt åbne arme og havde voldsomme ambitioner om at blive amerikanere, er et falsk narrativ, siger Løkke./ritzau/
title_translated: Loop before Vance Visit in Greenland: Need the level of knowledge growing
description_translated: When US Vice President, J.D. Vance, Friday, visits the military base Pituffik Space Base, Hope Foreign Minister Lars Løkke Rasmussen (M) that the vice president gets "a good briefing".- Because there is also a need for the level of knowledge to grow in this case, says Lars Løkke on Thursday afternoon after a meeting in the foreign policy mention. We do not recognize the picture that one senses in some places in the US political environment that Greenland is such a place filled with Chinese investments. To my knowledge there is zero.- So it is only good if people take out, get briefings and become wiser about what is up and down, says Lars Løkke. He also points out that the planned American "charming visit to the Greenlandic community" was canceled in favor of the visit to the US military base. That the narrative that there was a Greenlandic population with wide open arms and had violent ambitions to become Americans is a false narrative, says Løkke./Ritzau/

title: Fire ud af fem partier er med i ny grønlandsk regering
description: To uger efter det grønlandske valg, der havde både dansk, grønlandsk og international bevågenhed, tyder det på, at der er en ny regering på plads.Ifølge det grønlandske medie KNR er alle grønlandske partier på nær Naleraq med i en ny koalitionsaftale, der officielt bliver underskrevet fredag klokken 11 lokal tid i kulturhuset Katuaq. Det svarer til klokken 14 dansk tid.Demokraatits formand, Jens-Frederik Nielsen, bekræfter oplysningerne over for det grønlandske medie Sermitsiaq.I alt fem partier blev valgt ind i Inatsisartut, Grønlands parlament, ved valget, hvor Demokraatit blev tredoblet og endte med ti mandater.Herefter fulgte det selvstændighedsivrige Naleraq med otte mandater, regeringspartierne IA og Siumut med henholdsvis syv og fire mandater og endelig Atassut med to mandater.For blot tre dage siden var Naleraq ude af regeringsforhandlingerne, da Demokraatit og det ivrige selvstændighedsparti ikke kunne blive enige.Selv om de to partier godt kunne mødes på en række områder, var det spørgsmålet om Grønlands selvstændighed fra Danmark, som skilte de to partier ad.KNR skriver, at de fire partier, der nu er klar til at gå i regering sammen, samlet har 75 procent af stemmerne og derfor et solidt flertal.Formelt set falder regeringen først på plads, når den grønlandske regering, Naalakkersuisut, bliver godkendt i parlamentet.Formanden for Demokraatit, Jens-Frederik Nielsen, har efter valget betonet, at det er vigtigt med politisk sammenhold i en tid, hvor der er stor interesse for Grønland udefra.Derfor har han også været i forhandlinger med alle fem partier fra begyndelsen.Det liberale Demokraatit, der fik 29,9 procent af stemmerne, gik blandt andet til valg på forholdene på fiskeriområdet i Grønland.Og så er partiet tilhænger af, at den løsrivelsesproces fra rigsfællesskabet, som har været et omdrejningspunkt i valgkampen, skal ske stille og roligt i samarbejde med den danske regering./ritzau/
title_translated: Four out of five parties are in new Greenlandic government
description_translated: Two weeks after the Greenlandic election, which had both Danish, Greenlandic and international attention, it indicates that there is a new government in place. According to the Greenlandic media KNR, all Greenlandic parties except Naleraq are in a new coalition agreement, which will be officially signed at 11 am local time in the cultural center Katuaq. This is equivalent to 14 Danish time. Demokraatit's chairman, Jens-Frederik Nielsen, confirms the information against the Greenlandic media Sermitsiaq.In all five parties were elected to Inatsisartut, Greenland's Parliament, at the election, where DemraiTit tripled and ended with ten mandates. Seven and four mandates and finally Atassut with two mandates. Just three days ago, Naleraq was out of government talks when Democratite and the avid independence party could not agree. Although the two parties could meet in a number of areas, it was the question of Greenland's independence from Denmark, which separated the two parties. The votes and therefore a solid majority. Formally, the government only falls into place when the Greenlandic government, Naalakkersuisut, is approved in parliament. The chairman of Demraatit, Jens-Frederik Nielsen, has emphasized after the election that political unity is important in a time when there is great interest in Greenland outside. 29.9 percent of the vote went to elections in the conditions in the field of fishing in Greenland. And then the party is in favor of the detachment process from the Kingdom community, which has been a focal point in the election campaign, must be quietly in collaboration with the Danish government./ritzau/
